word:
There are many ways in which the youth can be putting to usury the talents entrusted to them of God, to build up the work and cause of God, not to please themselves but to glorify God. The Majesty of heaven, the King of glory, made the infinite sacrifice in coming to our 
                                                                           98
world in order that He might elevate and ennoble humanity. He was a persevering, diligent worker. We read, He "went about doing good."
